mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product ( bom_idx, client_idx, type, name, quantity, unit, price, expiration_date, reg_id, reg_date, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{bomIdx}, #{clientIdx}, #{type}, #{name}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{price}, #{expirationDate}, #{regId}, NOW(), 'N' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_raw_material WHERE idx = #{idx} AND is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_raw_material SET type = #{type}, bom_idx = #{bomIdx}, client_idx = #{clientIdx}, name = #{name}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, price = #{price}, expiration_date = #{expirationDate}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_date = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx} AND is_deleted = 'N'
UPDATE t_raw_material SET is_deleted = 'Y', mod_date = NOW() WHERE idx = #{idx}
